column4: Anyone with some knowledge of applications for Kubuntu have some time to talk? I'm a new user looking for some applications that might be useful for me
Honestly, I'm not sure what is all available for Linux
I've heard many mentions of an application called Wine but no idea what it is
WINE is a compatibility layer for running Windows programs on GNU/Linux. See https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Wine for more information, and see !AppDB for application compatibility.
